author: hossman
msg: SOLR-1240: Added support for generalized Numerical Range faceting on any numeric (or date) field.  Note: this required modifying ConvertedLegacyTest to deal with an expectation about how many fields a specific document has (there are more now because of a copyField i added to the schema)
